b'@MadThunderdome @Alex__Pitti @abdullaefakhro Fund admin is the majority of the business. Like 40% is VMS, but that proportion is growing through acquisition. I tend to view $SSNC as bundled mission critical business services provider akin to how I\xe2\x80\x99d view ADP. It\xe2\x80\x99d be such a hassle to change your NAV provider or legacy sys.'

b"SS&C is a founder led company where the CEO has skin in the game. 

It's tough to work for them, but Bill Stone always delivers for investors. 

The services are very sticky.

This is my only tech stock. $SSNC 
@MadThunderdome @abdullaefakhro @TesLad_6

https://t.co/CJqp2J2Hrg"
